Operations and Procurement Manager Job at Aren Paper Mills Limited




        
    

        
        Aren Paper Mills is a Nigerian manufacturing company focused on producing paperboard and packaging materials locally. We are building a stronger, more reliable operation and unlocking the full potential of our factory through better systems, processes, and people.

We are honest about our reality: manufacturing in Nigeria is challenging, and our operations are still being improved. This makes Aren a place for people who want to fix, build, and make things work better, not just maintain the status quo.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations and Procurement Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	A paper mill is seeking an Operations & Procurement Manager responsible for field-based raw material sourcing, factory spares procurement, and site operations.
	This role is heavily field-oriented, not desk-bound.
	The successful candidate will spend significant time in markets, collection centres, supplier yards, and with aggregators, building supply relationships and negotiating in Nigeria’s highly competitive and opaque waste paper market.
	The role is critical to keeping the factory running by ensuring consistent supply of waste paper at realistic target prices, timely availability of spares, and effective management of factory premises and company assets.


Key Responsibilities


	Conduct field-based sourcing of waste paper from collectors, aggregators, and bulk suppliers
	Negotiate and secure waste paper at realistic target prices while maintaining quality
	Build and manage a reliable supplier and aggregator network
	Track market movements and maintain internal pricing benchmarks
	Ensure critical spare parts availability to minimise downtime
	Oversee factory premises maintenance, utilities, and general site condition
	Manage company vehicles and basic fleet operations
	Liaise with waste vendors, transporters, and relevant government or regulatory bodies
	Maintain procurement records, supplier pricing benchmarks, and cost tracking.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Average waste paper purchase price vs target
	Continuity of raw material supply
	Reduction in emergency spare-part purchases
	Procurement cost control
	Condition and uptime of premises and vehicles.


Required Profile


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	Experience in field-based procurement within manufacturing or recycling-related sectors
	Proven ability to negotiate in informal and competitive supply markets
	Strong relationship-building and vendor management skills
	Practical understanding of factory operations and logistics
	Comfortable working in a challenging Nigerian operating environment
	Organised, firm, and accountable


What Success Looks Like


	Stable raw material supply at controlled prices
	Strong field-level supplier relationships
	Fewer production stoppages due to shortages
	Well-run, orderly factory environment.


We are looking for individuals who:


	Can solve problems and take ownership
	Are comfortable working in improving systems
	Understand the realities of Nigerian manufacturing
	Want their work to have visible impact.


Salary
N250,000 - N500,000 monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: workforceossl@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: If you are looking for a role where your skills can directly improve operations and help shape the future of a growing manufacturing company, this may be the right place for you.

title: Job Vacancies at Cross Beverage Company Limited
content:
Cross Beverage Company Limited - We are a Nigerian startup producing a portfolio of affordable, daily consumed drink products.Our products positions us to meet both everyday hydration needs and the demand for flavored, wholesome beverage in the Nigerian market

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Production Manager

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Cross Beverage Nigeria Limited is seeking a proactive and experienced Production and Operations Manager to lead the company’s production and operational activities.
	The ideal candidate will ensure efficient plant performance, effective resource utilization, and full compliance with safety and regulatory standards.
	This role requires strong leadership in managing production schedules, overseeing maintenance, monitoring quality control, and ensuring the smooth coordination of supply chain and logistics operations
	Reporting directly to the Managing Director, you will play a key role in driving productivity, reducing operational costs, and achieving sustainable growth in line with the company’s strategic objectives.


Responsibilities
Operations & Production Management:


	Oversee daily factory operations and ensure consistent production output to meet demand targets.
	Plan and manage production schedules, monitor raw material usage, and ensure timely product delivery.
	Supervise the maintenance and performance of production machinery to minimize downtime.
	Implement quality control measures to maintain product standards in line with NAFDAC and SON regulations.
	Enforce hygiene, safety, and environmental compliance across all production units.
	Supervise and motivate factory staff, ensuring discipline, punctuality, and adherence to company policies.
	Identify production bottlenecks and implement solutions to enhance workflow and efficiency.
	Report quality results, incidents, or deviations to the Quality Supervisor or Factory Manager.


Planning, Resource & Cost Management:


	Develop and execute monthly and quarterly production and operations plans aligned with business goals.
	Manage inventory levels and coordinate with procurement to ensure material availability.
	Control operational costs through effective resource utilization and waste reduction strategies.
	Forecast manpower, materials, and machinery requirements to meet production targets.
	Monitor and evaluate operational KPIs to measure efficiency, quality, and output.
	Provide data-driven recommendations for continuous process improvement.


Team Leadership & Reporting:


	Lead, train, and mentor production and operations teams to improve productivity and accountability.
	Conduct regular performance reviews and identify staff training needs.
	Prepare and submit detailed production, operations, and cost analysis reports to management.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc Degree in Engineering, Industrial Management, Industrial Chemistry, or related field.
	3–5 years of proven experience in production and production management (preferably in beverage or FMCG
	Understanding of quality standards (e.g., NAFDAC regulations).
	Basic lab skills and ability to operate testing equipment.
	Good written and verbal communication skills.
	Attention to detail and strong observation skills.
	Willingness to work shifts, weekends, and in production environments.


Salary
N90,000 - N100,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 19th July, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified caniddates should send their CV to: humanresources@crossbeverage.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email. 

 

2.) Pet Blowing Machine Operator 

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: Line Manager
Department: Production

Job Summary


	Cross Beverage Nigeria Limited is recruiting a highly experienced PET Blowing Machine Operator to strengthen our production team.
	This role is for a hands-on operator who can independently run PET blowing machines at high speed, maintain machine stability, and handle first-level maintenance without supervision.


Key Responsibilities


	Independently start, operate, and shut down PET blowing machines.
	Set and adjust heating zones, blowing pressure, and cycle speed based on bottle size and production requirements.
	Maintain consistent, high-speed bottle production throughout the shift.
	Inspect PET bottles for defects such as thin walls, weak bases, burn marks, and deformation.
	Identify root causes of defects and correct machine settings immediately.
	Prevent defective bottles from entering the filling and packaging line.
	Carry out first-level machine maintenance, including mould alignment, heater cleaning, and clearing air or cooling lines.
	Record daily production output, rejects, and downtime accurately.
	Work closely with the Production Supervisor to meet production targets.


Requirements & Qualifications


	3–5 years of proven hands-on experience operating PET blowing machines.
	Must have independently operated PET blowing machines for full production shifts (not as an assistant).
	Strong understanding of PET preform behavior, heating control, air pressure balance, and mould performance.
	Ability to troubleshoot and resolve common machine faults without waiting for a technician.
	Experience in water, beverage, or FMCG manufacturing is required.
	Physically fit and able to work long shifts, including overtime when required.


Salary
N100,000 Monthly. 

Application Closing Date: 14th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified caniddates should send their CV and application letter with details of specific PET blowing machines previously operated and years of hands-on experience in a Cover Letter to: humanresources@crossbeverage.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email. 

 

3.) Machine Operator / Technician 

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and proactive Technician to support our production operations by ensuring that all equipment, machines, and utilities are running efficiently.
	The Technician will be responsible for performing preventive maintenance, troubleshooting mechanical and electrical issues, and ensuring minimal downtime across the pure water and table water production lines.
	The ideal candidate should be hands-on, detail-oriented, safety-conscious, and able to work in a fast-paced production environment.


Key Responsibilities
Machine & Equipment Maintenance:


	Perform routine preventive maintenance on production machines (blowing machine, sachet machine, RO system, UV system, pumps, etc.).
	Diagnose and repair mechanical, electrical, and pneumatic faults promptly.
	Monitor machine performance and identify early signs of malfunction
	Ensure smooth machine operation during production hours.
	Respond immediately to machine breakdowns to reduce downtime.
	Calibrate and adjust equipment to maintain quality and production standards.
	Ensure all machines operate within safety and regulatory standards.
	Comply with company SOPs, GMP, and factory hygiene policies.
	Report hazards, unsafe practices, and malfunctioning equipment.


Documentation & Reporting:


	Maintain accurate records of maintenance activities, repairs, breakdowns, and parts used.
	Track inventory of spare parts and notify management when replacements are needed.
	Submit daily and weekly maintenance reports.
	Work closely with the Production Supervisor, Machine Operators, and Quality Control team.
	Provide technical guidance to machine operators when necessary.
	Support new equipment installations and testing.


Requirements and Qualifications


	SSCE/  OND or equivalent qualification.
	2–5 years of experience as a Technician in a water factory, beverage company, FMCG plant, or industrial production environment.
	Hands-on experience with sachet machines, blowing machines, pumps, RO systems, and other industrial equipment.
	Basic understanding of machinery operations and minor maintenance.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions accurately.
	Physically fit and able to stand for extended periods.
	Willingness to work shifts, including weekends and public holidays as required.


Application Closing Date: 14th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified caniddates should send their CV to: humanresources@crossbeverage.com and humanresourcescrossbeverages@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquries, WhatsApp 08162332499.

     

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "IT Support Officer",
  "description": "RemotewebNET Dynamics Limited is a technology-driven services company providing innovative, reliable, and scalable digital, engineering, and infrastructure solutions. The company is committed to supporting public and private sector organizations through the deployment of modern information technology systems, renewable energy solutions, and capacity-building programs that drive operational efficiency, sustainability, and digital transformation.

With a strong focus on quality delivery, compliance, and local content development, RemotewebNET Dynamics Limited delivers end-to-end solutions tailored to client needs across diverse industries, including government institutions, corporate organizations, development agencies, and SMEs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Support Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: Technical Specialist
Department: IT

Job Summary


	Skilled and motivated IT Support Officer with a strong background in networking and a broad understanding of various IT domains.
	As an IT Support Officer, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the overall IT infrastructure of organizations, providing technical assistance to end-users, troubleshooting network-related issues, and ensuring the smooth operation of technology systems.


Key Responsibilities


	Technical Support: Provide excellent technical support to end-users, both remotely and in person, by diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and networking issues in a timely manner. This includes troubleshooting, configuring, and repairing computer systems, peripheral devices, and network equipment.
	Network Administration: Administer and maintain the organization&#39;s computer networks, including but not limited to routers, switches, firewalls, and wireless access points. Perform regular network monitoring, optimization, and security updates to ensure network performance, reliability, and data protection.
	Help Desk Management: Respond promptly to IT support requests, documenting incidents, and providing detailed resolutions. Prioritize and escalate issues as necessary to ensure effective and efficient problem resolution.
	Software and Hardware Installation: Install, upgrade, and configure software applications, operating systems, and hardware components. Collaborate with vendors and internal teams to troubleshoot software compatibility issues and maintain an inventory of IT assets.
	User Training and Documentation: Develop and deliver user training sessions to enhance understanding of technology tools, systems, and security best practices. Create and update technical documentation, including user guides, FAQs, and knowledge base articles.
	IT Infrastructure Maintenance: Collaborate with the team to monitor, maintain, and optimize the organization&#39;s IT infrastructure, including servers, storage systems, backup solutions, and virtualization environments.
	Security Compliance: Assist in implementing and maintaining security protocols, policies, and procedures to protect the organization&#39;s data and systems from unauthorized access, viruses, and other security threats.
	Stay Updated: Keep abreast of emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in IT support, networking, and other relevant areas. Continuously expand your technical knowledge and skill set to adapt to evolving IT needs.


Qualifications
Education:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field is Preferred but not mandatory (or equivalent experience).


Experience:


	Minimum of 1 years of experience in IT support, networking, and related areas.
	Experience with network administration, troubleshooting, and working with various operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux) is essential.


Skills:


	Networking Skills: Knowledge of TCP/IP, LAN/WAN, VPN, DNS, DHCP, firewalls, routing, switching, and wireless technologies. Familiarity with network monitoring tools and security protocols (e.g., VLANs, IPSec) is preferred.
	Technical Proficiency: Proficient in diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and networking issues. Experience with Active Directory, Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, and remote desktop support tools are a plus. Certifications such as CompTIA A+, Network+, Cisco CCNA, or Microsoft MCSA/MCSE are advantageous.
	Communication and Customer Service: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical individuals effectively. Strong interpersonal skills and a customer-centric approach to providing IT support.
	Problem-Solving: Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving abilities. Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and manage time effectively while maintaining attention to detail.
	Adaptability: Willingness and ability to learn new technologies and adapt quickly to changes in the IT landscape. Flexibility to support other aspects of IT, such as systems administration, cybersecurity, or database management, as needed.
	Team Player: Proven ability to collaborate and work effectively within cross-functional teams. Willingness to share knowledge, assist colleagues, and contribute to the overall success of the IT department.
	Time Management: Ability to prioritize tasks, manage workload efficiently, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment


Certifications (Preferred):


	Microsoft 365 Certified
	CompTIA Network+
	CompTIA A+


Key Relationships


	Internal: Technical Specialist, IT Team, Tech Team, Business Development Manager, and others
	External: Clients, Client IT Teams and End Users, Technology Vendors and Service Providers Internet Service Providers (ISPs), Hardware and Software Suppliers, Partners, Vendors, Donors, etc.


Working Conditions
Physical Presence:


	This role requires the employee&rsquo;s physical presence at designated work locations, including both company premises and client sites, as necessary to fulfill job responsibilities.


Standard Hours:

IT Support Officer Job at RemotewebNET Dynamics Limited




        
    

        
        RemotewebNET Dynamics Limited is a technology-driven services company providing innovative, reliable, and scalable digital, engineering, and infrastructure solutions. The company is committed to supporting public and private sector organizations through the deployment of modern information technology systems, renewable energy solutions, and capacity-building programs that drive operational efficiency, sustainability, and digital transformation.

With a strong focus on quality delivery, compliance, and local content development, RemotewebNET Dynamics Limited delivers end-to-end solutions tailored to client needs across diverse industries, including government institutions, corporate organizations, development agencies, and SMEs.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Support Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: Technical Specialist
Department: IT

Job Summary


	Skilled and motivated IT Support Officer with a strong background in networking and a broad understanding of various IT domains.
	As an IT Support Officer, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the overall IT infrastructure of organizations, providing technical assistance to end-users, troubleshooting network-related issues, and ensuring the smooth operation of technology systems.


Key Responsibilities


	Technical Support: Provide excellent technical support to end-users, both remotely and in person, by diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and networking issues in a timely manner. This includes troubleshooting, configuring, and repairing computer systems, peripheral devices, and network equipment.
	Network Administration: Administer and maintain the organization's computer networks, including but not limited to routers, switches, firewalls, and wireless access points. Perform regular network monitoring, optimization, and security updates to ensure network performance, reliability, and data protection.
	Help Desk Management: Respond promptly to IT support requests, documenting incidents, and providing detailed resolutions. Prioritize and escalate issues as necessary to ensure effective and efficient problem resolution.
	Software and Hardware Installation: Install, upgrade, and configure software applications, operating systems, and hardware components. Collaborate with vendors and internal teams to troubleshoot software compatibility issues and maintain an inventory of IT assets.
	User Training and Documentation: Develop and deliver user training sessions to enhance understanding of technology tools, systems, and security best practices. Create and update technical documentation, including user guides, FAQs, and knowledge base articles.
	IT Infrastructure Maintenance: Collaborate with the team to monitor, maintain, and optimize the organization's IT infrastructure, including servers, storage systems, backup solutions, and virtualization environments.
	Security Compliance: Assist in implementing and maintaining security protocols, policies, and procedures to protect the organization's data and systems from unauthorized access, viruses, and other security threats.
	Stay Updated: Keep abreast of emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in IT support, networking, and other relevant areas. Continuously expand your technical knowledge and skill set to adapt to evolving IT needs.


Qualifications
Education:


	Bachelor’s Degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field is Preferred but not mandatory (or equivalent experience).


Experience:


	Minimum of 1 years of experience in IT support, networking, and related areas.
	Experience with network administration, troubleshooting, and working with various operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux) is essential.


Skills:


	Networking Skills: Knowledge of TCP/IP, LAN/WAN, VPN, DNS, DHCP, firewalls, routing, switching, and wireless technologies. Familiarity with network monitoring tools and security protocols (e.g., VLANs, IPSec) is preferred.
	Technical Proficiency: Proficient in diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and networking issues. Experience with Active Directory, Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, and remote desktop support tools are a plus. Certifications such as CompTIA A+, Network+, Cisco CCNA, or Microsoft MCSA/MCSE are advantageous.
	Communication and Customer Service: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical individuals effectively. Strong interpersonal skills and a customer-centric approach to providing IT support.
	Problem-Solving: Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving abilities. Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and manage time effectively while maintaining attention to detail.
	Adaptability: Willingness and ability to learn new technologies and adapt quickly to changes in the IT landscape. Flexibility to support other aspects of IT, such as systems administration, cybersecurity, or database management, as needed.
	Team Player: Proven ability to collaborate and work effectively within cross-functional teams. Willingness to share knowledge, assist colleagues, and contribute to the overall success of the IT department.
	Time Management: Ability to prioritize tasks, manage workload efficiently, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment


Certifications (Preferred):


	Microsoft 365 Certified
	CompTIA Network+
	CompTIA A+


Key Relationships


	Internal: Technical Specialist, IT Team, Tech Team, Business Development Manager, and others
	External: Clients, Client IT Teams and End Users, Technology Vendors and Service Providers Internet Service Providers (ISPs), Hardware and Software Suppliers, Partners, Vendors, Donors, etc.


Working Conditions
Physical Presence:


	This role requires the employee’s physical presence at designated work locations, including both company premises and client sites, as necessary to fulfill job responsibilities.


Standard Hours:


	The standard working hours are from 8:00?a.m. to 5:00?p.m., five (5) days per week, however, weekend and overtime work may be required.


Client Site Hours:


	When working at a client’s location, the employees’ working hours shall align with the client’s standard operating hours, provided they are reasonable and communicated in advance.
	Any required adjustments must be approved by management, and applicable overtime compensation will apply.


Compensation & Benefits


	Pay: N120,000 - N160,000 / month. 
	Employees will receive a competitive salary based on their role and experience. In addition to their salary, employees are entitled to the following benefits:
	Pension: Enrollment in the company’s pension scheme, with contributions made in accordance with applicable laws and company policy.
	Health Benefits: Access to health benefits, including medical insurance, as provided under the company’s health plan.


Method of Application
